page.title: 03Quatford Wood
page.content: The smell of petrol fumes as cars rush along the A.458,no birds can be heard because of the noise of lorries,cars and vans. Once we are in the wood the sound of birds singing and animals rustling through the leaves can be heard. The petrol fumes have gone, and the musty smell of leaves,trees and woodland comes to my nose.The woodland in which we went was called Spring Valley.We found that just under the thin layer of soil was solid sand rock.After going through the wood,our trip took us back out on to the dusty road,up the old Worcester road,not often used now, and passed the'Gallows Field' where men where once hung, and on back to school.
